Automating Winsteps Output with winstepsR Preface

Automating Winsteps Output with winstepsR Jeffrey Snowden 2024-05-25 Preface Welcome to “Automating Winsteps Output with winstepsR.” This book provides a comprehensive guide to using the winstepsR package to automate the generation of output files from Winsteps. In the following chapters, you will learn how to create control files, process datasets, and generate extensive output files without manually opening Winsteps. The book is structured as follows: Chapter 1: Chapter 2: Chapter 3: Let’s get started!
